meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gina Makarski Christopher Eaton Alicen Nadal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4405.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Gina Makarski, a stay-at-home mom from Arlington Heights, Illinois
Christopher Eaton, a freelance writer from Chicago, Illinois
Alicen Nadal, an office manager from Richmond Hill, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,801)

tr.td: ROCKS & MINERALS
TV TRANSPORTATION
REMEMBER THE ALAMO?
CARD GAME NAMES
GHOSTS
"BOO"!
